mount_suffix.description: Suffix to append to the mount name to get the KV mount.
mount_suffix.title: Mount Suffix

wrap_ttl.description: Whether to request approle secret_id as a response-wrapping token with a certain TTL. If not set, no wrapping will be made to secret_id. Otherwise, wrap_ttl specifies the duration of seconds before the expiration of the response-wrapping token.
wrap_ttl.title: Wrap TTL

egress_subnet.description: Egress subnet to use, in CIDR notation.
egress_subnet.title: Egress Subnet

nonce.description: Uniquely identifying value for this unit. `secrets.token_hex(16)` is recommended.
nonce.title: Nonce

description: The schema for the requirer side of this interface.
title: RequirerSchema
